channel.title: Cystemx Server Development - Looking for Proffesional, Mature team-members
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][u]CYSTEMX[/u][/size]
Creating a New RSPS and looking for certain coders & developers to help out. The Servers' name is: Cystemx
[u]What are you trying to Achieve?[/u] I am trying to achieve a successfull 24/7 server which will be very fun to play with lots of mini-games, quests, friendly community and a good economy.
[u]Have you made any Servers before[/u] I have made a good 7 or 8 RSPS', Some being quite successfull and others just being the dog's bollocks. I've always had a dream to run a huge popular server, but I have just never had enough cash to provide for the advertising to draw in new players. But now I have a decent job with a Decent income which will be able to fund the server.
[u]What do you intend to happen in-game?[/u] I have drawn out a little map of what I have maybe thought about, It's just bassically transforming the whole of Varrock Castle into a little Home area for all players, Mostly other area's around the map will be out of bounds and un-accessable for players. Here is a picture of what I have in mind roughly-
Here is just a picture of the Map: [IMG]http://i230.photobucket.com/albums/ee35/Grantypeno/1-8.png[/img]
AND here is a picture of my plans roughly (With a noob-friendly Key) :
[IMG]http://i230.photobucket.com/albums/ee35/Grantypeno/2-7.png[/img]
[u]Who are you wanting to join your Development Team?[/u] Well I am looking for a number of talented people with a number of skills;
[ul][li]Mature/Formal[/li] [li]Alot of Experience[/li] [li]Some decent Knowledge[/li] [li]How to Code/Develop a Server & Website[/li][/ul]
I know what I am asking for maybe a bit too much, but for those talented people who know alot on coding, I am offering a fair amount of cash; As you will be working for me and helping me out, So I am willing to pay some cash for the help I recieve.
I am also looking for Web Designers, Or who ever else knows what they're doing when it comes to website coding, I am hoping to have a Professional layout to the Website & Forums. In the website's Navigation, I am looking for the following pages to be coded correctly;
[ul][li]Play now (Webclient)[/li] [li]Forums[/li] [li]HighScores[/li] [li]IRC (Live Chat)[/li] [li]Membership OR Donations[/li][/ul]
I am also looking to have the Server data connected to the website, So when you like Register your account on the Forums/Main site, It also then creates your account In-Game.
Also looking out for Client developers to help out with the Client.
I think the Server will be a 459, But if any of you suggest something better and with a good reason, I may go along with it. I am not looking for no Average coders, but more or less decent ones who know alot when it comes to coding as I know most of the basics due to previously-owned servers.
I hope ALL members can contribute to my DREAM of having a sucessfull server, And if you are interested in helping out, then give me a PM here, Reply to this thread, Or give me an e-mail; Cystemx@live.co.uk And I shall get back to you A.S.A.P!
Thanks for taking the time to read this thread, Peace.[/center]

item.title: Cystemx Server Development - Looking for Proffesional, Mature team-members
item.dc:creator: @Sanity_Maiden Sanity Maiden
item.description:
@Sanity_Maiden wrote:

Hey dude, i can help with the coding, i need something to do in my spare time.
Basicly my daily routine is.
Wake up 7Am
School 7:30Am - 4 Pm
Computer 4PM - 10PM

Lul, sometimes i go out but more time on Computer, on weekends im on like all the time so i can get alot of work done.
I am experienced in coding, wouldnt say proffessional but i moderately good.
Anyways hope i get the Job xD

  • Sanity

[EDIT] Also i forgot to mention, i do this for free. 100%.
Dont need the cash

Read full topic
item.source: Cystemx Server Development - Looking for Proffesional, Mature team-members

item.title: Cystemx Server Development - Looking for Proffesional, Mature team-members
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

[center][size=24pt]CYSTEMX[/size]

Creating a New RSPS and looking for certain coders & developers to help out.
The Servers’ name is: Cystemx

What are you trying to Achieve?
I am trying to achieve a successfull 24/7 server which will be very fun to play with lots of mini-games, quests, friendly community and a good economy.

Have you made any Servers before
I have made a good 7 or 8 RSPS’, Some being quite successfull and others just being the dog’s bollocks. I’ve always had a dream to run a huge popular server, but I have just never had enough cash to provide for the advertising to draw in new players. But now I have a decent job with a Decent income which will be able to fund the server.

What do you intend to happen in-game?
I have drawn out a little map of what I have maybe thought about, It’s just bassically transforming the whole of Varrock Castle into a little Home area for all players, Mostly other area’s around the map will be out of bounds and un-accessable for players. Here is a picture of what I have in mind roughly-

Here is just a picture of the Map:

1-8.png521×613

AND here is a picture of my plans roughly (With a noob-friendly Key) :

2-7.png756×613

Who are you wanting to join your Development Team?
Well I am looking for a number of talented people with a number of skills;

[ul][li]Mature/Formal[/li]
[li]Alot of Experience[/li]
[li]Some decent Knowledge[/li]
[li]How to Code/Develop a Server & Website[/li][/ul]

I know what I am asking for maybe a bit too much, but for those talented people who know alot on coding, I am offering a fair amount of cash; As you will be working for me and helping me out, So I am willing to pay some cash for the help I recieve.

I am also looking for Web Designers, Or who ever else knows what they’re doing when it comes to website coding, I am hoping to have a Professional layout to the Website & Forums. In the website’s Navigation, I am looking for the following pages to be coded correctly;

[ul][li]Play now (Webclient)[/li]
[li]Forums[/li]
[li]HighScores[/li]
[li]IRC (Live Chat)[/li]
[li]Membership OR Donations[/li][/ul]

I am also looking to have the Server data connected to the website, So when you like Register your account on the Forums/Main site, It also then creates your account In-Game.

Also looking out for Client developers to help out with the Client.

I think the Server will be a 459, But if any of you suggest something better and with a good reason, I may go along with it.
I am not looking for no Average coders, but more or less decent ones who know alot when it comes to coding as I know most of the basics due to previously-owned servers.

I hope ALL members can contribute to my DREAM of having a sucessfull server, And if you are interested in helping out, then give me a PM here, Reply to this thread, Or give me an e-mail; Cystemx@live.co.uk
And I shall get back to you A.S.A.P!

Thanks for taking the time to read this thread, Peace.[/center]
